# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
# parse.py

# function import BeautifulSoup
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

# genetic import codecs
import codecs

# è®€æª”
f = codecs.open("data.html", 'r', 'utf-8')

é€é soup.select('span[class=UFICommentBody] a')æœƒå›å‚³æ‰€æœ‰class ç‚º UFICommentBodyä¹‹ <span>ä¸‹çš„ <a>ã€‚ç”±æ–¼çµæœä¸åªä¸€ç­†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å›å‚³çš„æ˜¯ä¸€å€‹é™£åˆ—ã€‚é€éforå»èµ°è¨ªå®ƒï¼Œè€Œæˆ‘å€‘éœ€è¦çš„åªæœ‰ <a> tag è£¡çš„æ–‡å­—ï¼Œå› æ­¤ç”¨ .get_text() å»å–å¾—æ–‡å­—ã€‚


s = ""

for child in soup.select('span[class=UFICommentBody] a'):
    s = s + "\"" + child.get_text() + "\","

print(s)
